spec_data.Name: vdsm-hook-scratchpad
spec_data.Description:
scratchpad hook for VDSM
Hook creates a disk for a VM onetime usage,
the disk will be erased when the VM destroyed.
VM cannot be migrated when using scratchpad hook
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 03:25:01 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: One time disk creation for VDSM
